TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class CommunicationClientFactoryBase<TCommunicationClient> : Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ICommunicationClientFactory<TCommunicationClient> where TCommunicationClient : ICommunicationClient

.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CommunicationClientFactoryBase`1<(class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ICommunicationClient) TCommunicationClient> extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ICommunicationClientFactory`1<!TCommunicationClient>

Docs.summary: Provides the base implementation of ICommunicationClientFactory for creating communication clients to talk to service fabric services. Extend the CommunicationClientFactoryBase class to create communication clients for custom transport implementations. This class maintains a cache of communication clients and attempts to reuse the clients for requests to the same service endpoint.
